channel.title: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)
channel.description:
Hello, this is my first ever private server project I made which is based on an Espeon 508 source.
This server is only partly finished, there's a lot of stuff to work on if you want to use this as your source. Things such as memory leaks etc, although the crucial bugs have been fixed, this was my first ever RSPS project so don't expect it to be some expertly coded epic RSPS because it's not.
It is a SPAWN server. There is no donor status right now or anything like that. If you want some specific item do ::item id amount.
It is purely PvP based. Meaning I didn't bother coding PvM. Most specs are on this, like dds godswords etc.
This is all server-sided and any 525 cache /should/, in theory, work with this server.
No anti-leeches! (woohoo) :D
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Working godswords & specs & bandos 100%[/li] [li]Working barrage + blitz + freezes 90%[/li] [li]Working DFS spec 100%[/li] [li]Working veng/veng other 100%[/li] [li]Mage Bank 50%[/li] [li]Working trade, pm, clan chat[/li] [li]Mute, ban, ipban, unmute[/li] [li]Other specs such as msb, dds etc[/li] [li]Combat works great 98%[/li] [li]Food pots work fine[/li] [li]KDR system[/li] [li]Report system[/li] [li]Toggle xp option[/li] [li]Hidden admin (p rights 3)[/li] [li]A large array of regular commands such as ::bank, ::maxstr, ::godswords, ::lunars, ::ancients[/li] [li]Customized quest tab:[/li] [li]Ticket system for 508 (click it, it tells mod or admin that you need help and they can tele to you)[/li] [li]Includes teleports and many useful spawns[/li] [li]DT pyramid and Lunar Isle altars function to change spellbooks with extra gfx[/li] [li]Stat changing commands such as ::master, ::pure, ::zerker[/li] [li]Custom logout and bank text[/li] [li]Global announcements when someone is muted/banned/promoted/demoted[/li] [li]Kick command[/li] [li]Added staff tele command usable by admins only which teles all mods + staff to admin who uses it[/li] [li]Added gfx and emote commands which makes the player do those actions (admin only)[/li] [li]Mage Bank coding 96% of it working (levers work but the webs thing isnt like rs)[/li][/ul]
And more...
[b]Bug fixes/tweaks I made[/b]
[ul][li]Fixed bank minimap disconnect bug[/li] [li]Fixed endless wilderness zone[/li] [li]Made the ::givemod and ::giveadmin functions actually work, as well ::demote[/li] [li]Made banks one-clickable instead of two[/li][/ul]
Some pics: [size=28pt]I DO NOT GIVE PERMISSION FOR PEOPLE TO USE THESE IMAGES.[/size]
Login screen: [img]http://i.imgur.com/mh6YBpK.png[/img]
Part of quest tab: [img]http://i.imgur.com/tJde9wk.png[/img]
Godswords with specs: [img]http://i.imgur.com/RbXwCwy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/c2UkK14.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vQazDx0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xdsvYAk.png[/img]
Working dh [img]http://i.imgur.com/h3lwgPb.png[/img]
Veng (also veng other) [img]http://i.imgur.com/Z9DGpAO.png[/img]
Switching to Ancients: [img]http://i.imgur.com/8qiDW0O.png[/img]
Switching to Lunars: [img]http://i.imgur.com/F9fsAfd.png[/img]
Global promoting/demoting announcements: [img]http://i.imgur.com/3dJzmMI.png[/img]
How it looks from the person being demoted/promoted: (hidden admin doesn't show up as global on either ;)) [img]http://i.imgur.com/zpHZ3nF.png[/img]
I had a lot of fun making this, it's just my first server partly done so don't expect too much! (there are some memory leaks and w/e I haven't fully tested it)
[size=24pt]Source+client+cache bundle:[/size] [url=http://up.ht/19IdvHG][size=44pt]57.1MB[/size][/url] [url=http://www.dropbox.com/s/kz0sb2ar50prt4k/OzankX.rar][size=44pt](backup mirror link)[/size][/url] [size=24pt]I do not give anyone the permission to upload my server and claim it theirs. If you do use my source as a base [b]you must give credits![/b][/size]
Credits: Source (Espeon) Me

item.title: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

Silex:

Having trouble finding player rights, or making people admin/owner…

Um go search for your player’s name once you make your acc and change the rights from 0 to 2 (admin), or 3 (hidden admin).

Read full topic

item.title: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)
item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

[quote=“testcrasher1, post:16, topic:532537”]Great release! quick question, i found the piece of code where the dialog box to enter the ip address into the client is. I was wondering if i could somehow add a line or two saying that i want my server’s ip to be automatically in that dialog box when the user boots up the client. (haven’t done much with Java, so i’d really appreciate the help.)

code:

Class75_Sub2.aBoolean3314 = false;
	    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,"Please enter IP address:");
	    Class26.aRSString_521 = Class68_Sub28_Sub2.aRSString_4556;
	    Class68_Sub13_Sub20.anInt3780 = 0;
	    client var_client = new client();
	    var_client.method21(765, 503, 109, 27, "runescape", 508,
				32 - -Class13_Sub4.anInt2690);
	    Class108.aFrame1832.setLocation(40, 40);

P.S. this is just for testing purposes, i have no plans on leeching, thanks in advanced.[/quote]

I don’t fully know this myself, but I’m guessing it’s this line

    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,"Please enter IP address:");

Which becomes

    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = 0.0.0.0;

you can do 127.0.0.1 too but both work, they are internal computer IPs

Read full topic
item.source: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)

item.title: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)
item.dc:creator: @testcrasher1 testcrasher1
item.description:
@testcrasher1 wrote:

Great release! quick question, i found the piece of code where the dialog box to enter the ip address into the client is. I was wondering if i could somehow add a line or two saying that i want my server’s ip to be automatically in that dialog box when the user boots up the client. (haven’t done much with Java, so i’d really appreciate the help.)

code:

Class75_Sub2.aBoolean3314 = false;
	    Class68_Sub9.aString2883 = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null,"Please enter IP address:");
	    Class26.aRSString_521 = Class68_Sub28_Sub2.aRSString_4556;
	    Class68_Sub13_Sub20.anInt3780 = 0;
	    client var_client = new client();
	    var_client.method21(765, 503, 109, 27, "runescape", 508,
				32 - -Class13_Sub4.anInt2690);
	    Class108.aFrame1832.setLocation(40, 40);

P.S. this is just for testing purposes, i have no plans on leeching, thanks in advanced.

Read full topic
item.source: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)

item.title: [508 loading 525 SPAWN] OzankX V1.00 release - NO ANTI-LEECH! (Espeon source)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Ozank, post:14, topic:532537”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=651329.msg4369027#msg4369027 date=1380230643]

I still don’t see how godswords with specs is such a big achievement?

But still, nice to see 508s as not dead.

You’re right, they’re not really, but in 508s the GWD stuff is probably the most latest thing in them. (along with DFS, btw that works fine too). Just think the specs look nice to show off xD lol.

474/459 actually introduced godwars + dfs.

That’s definitely true, but I can’t remember anything useful Jagex put in RS between 474-508 oh well :P.

p.s. I updated description of server if theres any pics you guys want ask and ill post if i can

HD RS.
[/quote]
Really? There’s no “RS2HD” in my 508, idk about any others but its 508 running 525.[/quote]
RS introduced high definition in 508 (or 503?).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ozank Ozank
item.description:
@Ozank wrote:

nolan2131:

Looks nice overall but how is the combat? Also the global announcement as to when someone is demoted or banned is kind of cruel.

Combat is great PvP wise. Not so good PvM wise, because I didn’t bother coding that in (I’m not a fan of PvM RSPS :P)

Also people thanks for the nice feedback ^^ i’ll get the download link up soon (fixing a couple things I found wrong derp)
